title: Scout24如何利用AI构建下一代房地产搜索
description: Scout24创建了一个由GPT-5驱动的对话助手，它重塑了房地产搜索体验，通过澄清问题、摘要和量身定制的房源推荐来引导用户。
titleZh: Scout24如何利用AI构建下一代房地产搜索
titleEn: How Scout24 is leveraging AI to build the next generation of real estate search
descriptionZh: Scout24创建了一个由GPT-5驱动的对话助手，它重塑了房地产搜索体验，通过澄清问题、摘要和量身定制的房源推荐来引导用户。
descriptionEn: Scout24 has created a conversational assistant powered by GPT-5 that reinvents the real estate search experience, guiding users with clarifying questions, summaries, and tailored listing recommendations.

title: 马斯克擎天柱再遭重大“失败”，摔倒前摘下“不存在的VR耳机”，引发网友狂潮：这是人类遥控吗？
description: 难道擎天柱没能实现真正的自主控制，还在依赖人类远程操作吗？
titleZh: 马斯克擎天柱再遭重大“失败”，摔倒前摘下“不存在的VR耳机”，引发网友狂潮：这是人类遥控吗？
titleEn: Musk's Optimus Suffers Another Major "Fail," Takes Off "Non-existent VR Headset" Before Falling, Sparking Online Frenzy: Is This Human Remote Control?
descriptionZh: 难道擎天柱没能实现真正的自主控制，还在依赖人类远程操作吗？
descriptionEn: Has Optimus failed to achieve true autonomous control and is still relying on human remote operation?

title: SpaceX + 轨道数据中心，马斯克的下一个人工智能大叙事？
description: 市场正在为人工智能基础设施的全新宏大叙事定价。
titleZh: SpaceX + 轨道数据中心，马斯克的下一个人工智能大叙事？
titleEn: SpaceX + Orbital Data Centers, Musk's Next Grand AI Narrative?
descriptionZh: 市场正在为人工智能基础设施的全新宏大叙事定价。
descriptionEn: The market is pricing in a brand-new grand narrative for AI infrastructure. The underlying logic behind SpaceX's valuation doubling lies in the expansion of its business boundaries. Musk is outlining a blueprint for SpaceX to venture into orbital data centers, believing they are the fastest way to expand computing power in the next four years. They could solve Earth's power shortage issues and offer advantages like ultimate cooling, unlimited solar energy, and zero operational costs.

descriptionEn: Denise Dresser will join as chief revenue officer, responsible for overseeing OpenAI’s global revenue strategy in the areas of enterprise and customer success.

descriptionEn: OpenAI co-founded the Autonomous Agent AI Foundation under the Linux Foundation and donated the AGENTS.md file to support the establishment of an open, interoperable and secure autonomous agent AI standard.

title: 人工智能主体损害的责任归属：现有法律框架的适应与调整
description: 关于人工智能代理造成的损害，目前有人呼吁对责任法进行彻底改革。
titleZh: 人工智能主体损害的责任归属：现有法律框架的适应与调整
titleEn: Liability Attribution for Damages Caused by AI Agents: Adaptation and Adjustment of Existing Legal Frameworks
descriptionZh: 关于人工智能代理造成的损害，目前有人呼吁对责任法进行彻底改革。
descriptionEn: Regarding damages caused by AI agents, there are current calls for a complete overhaul of liability law. Based on a law and economics analysis, this article argues that existing negligence and product liability frameworks are sufficiently adaptable. Only targeted adjustments are needed to effectively allocate risks, avoiding the need for a complete rebuild, which could stifle technological innovation.
